duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the process of acquiring goods and services needed by the organization, ensuring efficient sourcing, negotiation, purchasing, and contract management while adhering to budgetary constraints and regulatory requirements.
Demonstrate expertise in contract compliance procedures, ensuring that all procurement activities align with university policies, regulations, and legal requirements.
Proficiently negotiate contracts, manage redline negotiations, and ensure favorable terms for the university while maintaining collaborative relationships with vendors.
Ensure policy adherence throughout the procurement process, ensuring that all departmental procurements align with university guidelines and standards.
Analyze complex procurement scenarios, identify potential challenges, and devise innovative solutions to ensure efficient and compliant procurement processes.
Handle a variety of procurement needs across departments such as IT, research, professional services, and scientific acquisitions, showcasing versatility in procurement management.
Collaborate cross-functionally, processing purchase orders from various university units, promoting seamless communication and procurement coordination.
